title: Calycosin limits hepatic fibrogenesis via KLF15 dependent repression of P2X7R in thioacetamide-induced hepatic fibrosis.
abstract: Astragalus membranaceus (Fisch.) Bunge is a traditional Chinese medicinal herb that has been documented for its hepatoprotective properties and therapeutic potential. Calycosin, derived from Astragalus membranaceus (Fisch.) Bunge is a natural flavonoid widely used in ameliorating chronic liver diseases.
